advantages.name: Why are PV module repairs necessary?
advantages.value: Repairing the panels can be the most affordable way to restore a PV system. Especially when there are no replacement modules available

advantages.name: Why are PV module repairs necessary?
advantages.value: The optics of a PV system are important. After a repair, the optics of your system stay the same
